summary: The diff implements both REQ-62 and REQ-63 requirements. Backend changes add author profile name retrieval and migration logic for message data structure changes. Frontend updates include displaying author names from the message data. Both requirements appear to be fully implemented based on the available evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: Migration module (backend/migration.mo) that converts old message format to new internal message format with Principal field
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest makes no mention of data migration, message format conversion, or handling legacy message data. This is implementation detail that goes beyond the stated requirements.
